name: chinadaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: chinadaily.com.cn, the English version of chinadaily.com.cn, a website by the China Daily newspaper, now offers the following feeds in the RSS format. The feeds are free of charge to use for individuals and non-profit organizations for non-commercial use.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
